SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, p.owner_id, p.status, p.priority, p.description, p.start_time, p.end_time, p.completion_time, p.version, p.is_deleted, p.create_time, p.update_time, COUNT( CASE WHEN t.status = 'completed' AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS completed_task_count, COUNT( CASE WHEN t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS all_task_count, CONCAT( '[', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(t.create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 DAY AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), ',', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(t.create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 5 DAY AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), ',', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(t.create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 4 DAY AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), ',', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(t.create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 3 DAY AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), ',', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(t.create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 DAY AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), ',', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(t.create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), ',', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(t.create_time) = CURDATE() AND t.is_deleted = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), ']' ) AS weekData FROM ${@per.stu.pms.common.constants.TableConstants@TABLE_PROJECT} p LEFT JOIN ${@per.stu.pms.common.constants.TableConstants@TABLE_TASK} t ON p.project_id = t.project_id WHERE p.is_deleted = FALSE
AND p.status IN
#{status}
GROUP BY p.project_id, p.project_name, p.owner_id, p.status, p.priority, p.description, p.start_time, p.end_time, p.completion_time, p.version, p.is_deleted, p.create_time, p.update_time ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
